wikimedia-copyrightwarning:
Ĩdé rewardari sinimuka'etá ramẽ, ĩdé reyaré [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Terms_of_Use puruçawa rekô'etá] açui umukatiuru uyuyuriĩma ne pitimũgawa [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ mutarawa rupí CC-BY-SA 3.0] açui [https://www.gnu.org/copyleft/fdl.html mutarawa GFDL].
Reyaré iwiri yepé hiperyumũdiçawa ã URL i rapé awiana mureçewa çui mutarawa rekô'etá upé Creative Commons çui.
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked:
'''Ne IP ikurẽdawa uso'ana [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|sikĩdawa panhẽ wiki upé]].'''

Sikĩdawa munhãgara: $1 ($2).
Ĩdé reikú sikĩdawa nhaãçé: ''$3''.

* Sikĩdawa yupirũgawa: $4
* Sikĩdawa upawa: $5

Ne IP ikurẽdawa kuiriwara i $6.
Katuçawa rupí, e-meẽ panhẽ pukatua'etá ĩdé resó renheẽ yãdé irũ ramẽ.

Ĩdé remaité ramẽ yawá yepé ganariçawa, repurú rewaçẽmu mbeuçawa açui kuauçawa píri opaĩwara rekô [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|''proxies'' sikĩdawa]].
Tiramẽ, unheẽ kuá sikĩdawa reçé, katuçawa rupí [[m:Steward requests/Global|e-munhã yepé amũmaãgawa yururewa]].
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked-xff:
'''Yepé ã píri miaçuwa proxy taupuru'ana ne yururewa rupí tauso'ana [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|sikĩdawa panhẽ wiki upé]].'''

Awata umunhã'ana sikĩdawa: $1 ($2).
Yawá uso'ana sikĩdawa nhaãçé: ''$3''.

* Sikĩdawa yupirũgawa: $4
* Sikĩdawa upawa: $5

Proxy ikurẽdawa sikĩdawa i $6.
Katuçawa rupí, e-meẽ panhẽ pukatua'etá ĩdé resó ramẽ repurãdu yepé maã yãdé çupé.

Ĩdé remaité ramẽ yawá yepé ganariçawa, repurú rewaçẽmu kuauçawa'etá mburipíriwara açui mbeuçawa'etá opaĩwara rekô upé [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|proxies sikĩdawa]].
Tiramẽ, unheẽ kuá sikĩdawa reçé, [[m:Steward requests/Global|e-munhã amũmaãgawa yururewa Meta-Wiki upé]].
